# `/script` Command
Debugging options for GameTest Framework.

<table>
  <tr>
    <th>Permission Level</th>
    <td>Admin</td>
  </tr>
  <tr>
    <th>Requires Cheats?</th>
    <td>Yes</td>
  </tr>
</table>

## Usage
### Start profiler
`/script profiler start`

Start profiler.

### Stop profiler
`/script profiler stop`

Stop profiler.

### Watchdog export stats
`/script watchdog exportstats`

Export watchdog stats
